frontmatter.title: API info page
frontmatter.tags: Iconography, Desktop layout, Mobile layout, Typography, Iconography, Photoshop

pageProps.content:
At Syndy I was created a marketing page for Syndy's API. Algirdas Desceras created the wireframe and I also got some help from the dev guys Rogier Pennink and Boris Samoyenko during the designing process.

The task was to make sure that the visitor understands what a big advantage is to use Syndy via API. The main emphasis is still on the copy, but the icons and other visual elements are there to help to understand it better. As a result we ended up with an easy to digest page.
